strapiPost.title: Eureka Springs Publishes New Historic Preservation Guidelines
strapiPost.content:
Eureka Springs has newly published historic district design guidelines to preserve the city's residential and commercial dwellings. 

  • Refresh: The historic district guidelines have been updated for the first time after nearly two decades since the originals were published. The new guidelines have a full section on Eureka Springs' History, a full section on different architectural types, and more. 
  • Taking care: The documents are full of artistic sketches of actual buildings in Eureka Springs with character-defining features that tell the story of the city's history. The new guidelines are to "enhance the ongoing stewardship and conservation of the community's varied historic architectural resources." 

Learn more HERE.
